title: Brices Cross Roads National Battlefield Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       We hope that your visit to Brices Cross Roads National Battlefield is enjoyable and safe. Please keep the following in mind while visiting the site:   Mississippi summers are sunny, hot, and humid. Sunscreen, a hat, and plenty of drinking water are recommended if you spend time outside.  Be alert for fire ant hills while walking around the monument site, and avoid stepping on these hills.  To avoid falls, and damage to the historic artifacts, please do not climb or sit on the monuments and cannons.  Bees, wasps, and other biting insects can nest in the cannons; do not reach into, or look directly into the cannons.
